resources.string: Tara Westover is an American author living in the UK. Born in Idaho to a father opposed to public education, she never attended school. She spent her days working in her earned an MPhil from Trinity College, Cambridge in 2009, and in 2010 was a visiting fellow a t Harvard University. She returned to Cambridge, where she was awarded a PhD in history in 2014. Tara Westover is an American author living in the UK.
